2.HeroHeading:
Safety Management Challenges
within the Agriculture Industry

HeroDescription.title: Paper Recordkeeping
HeroDescription.desc: Are you working with a dated, binder-based safety and log process? When CalOSHA asks for your maintenance, equipment, and safety logs, do you have a quick way to provide those?

HeroDescription.title: Lack of Preparedness
HeroDescription.desc: Is it difficult to stay ahead of inspections and audits? Do you feel prepared should equipment break down or an injury occurs?

HeroDescription.title: Immature Safety Program
HeroDescription.desc: How robust is your safety program? If you have a safety program in place, can you efficiently take ownership of it, or do you use a third-party to train your team?

1.heading: Our Mission: Empower everyone to be a safety champion
1.description1: In 2014, our three founders lost a mutual friend in a workplace accident. The incident sparked an interest in streamlining workplace safety.
1.description2: Today, thousands of companies worldwide trust Safesite, a powerful, easy-to-use safety management solution proven to cut incident rates in half.
1.quote: With Safesite, we were able to achieve an 84% reduction in recordable incident rate and a 100% reduction in lost time incident rate.
1.name: Derek Smith
1.title: JR Cruz New York, NY

2.heading: Our Values
2.subHeading: We‚Äôre driven by a vision of a safer future

values.title: Home Safe
values.description: There is a reason we call out the importance of safety and what we do first in this list: because it‚Äôs the most important. Our vision directly supports improving safety for everyone. Solutions that save lives are always prioritized over those that don‚Äôt, because there is no more important objective than saving a life.

values.title: Tenacity
values.description: We know that change does not develop or solidify in a week. It‚Äôs more challenging to do what‚Äôs right than what‚Äôs easy, but we push hard to get it done anyway. We don‚Äôt wait around for the world to change itself; we take on the burden of driving change and we stay the course.

values.title: Aim Higher
values.description: We don‚Äôt settle for what‚Äôs just acceptable. The only option is excellence, and we‚Äôre always finding ways to raise the bar, because our customers deserve nothing less. We work to create a better future for ourselves and the customers we serve.

values.title: Comradery
values.description: To push change, we need collectively as one group. Everyone contributes. Everyone plays their part. The Safesite culture thrives when we support each other as a team. The greater the foundation we build, the stronger we are together.

values.title: Simplicity
values.description: We understand the clear benefits of keeping things simple. At its highest level, technology is at its most powerful when the end experience is simple. We work tirelessly to ensure we‚Äôre not complicating safety, but instead making it easier to practice.

values.title: Agility
values.description: Considering where the safety industry is heading, developing new products, and adapting quickly are essential. We stay nimble to address industry changes and customer needs with flexibility and speed, so both we and our customers can navigate rapid technological and sociological change.

3.heading: Come work with us!
3.description: Join our team of passionate people.
